review.reviewBody: Usu this a&w does a great job with their food but today the fries were terribly dry.
We had the English Muffin Sausage & Egger® Combos added bacon. The order came hot and delicious, the best we've ever had. They're hashbrowns are the best.
Food was hot and great but sadly received 3 strips instead of the 5 I ordered :(
Ringer burgers are the best, our fave. Hope they stay on the menu. They have everything.
The new Ringer Burger is the best, the BBQ sauce is tangy, not sweet, the provolone has great flavour and love the onion rings. This burger needs to stay on the menu.
